segment.source: Use the Customize page to finish creating the virtual application package or to configure the virtual application package further.
segment.target: Use the Customize page to finish creating the virtual application package or to configure the virtual application package further.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Creates a basic virtual application package.
segment.target: Creates a basic virtual application package.

segment.source: If you select this option, the package creation will finish, and the package will be available in the Sequencer console.
segment.target: If you select this option, the package creation will finish, and the package will be available in the Sequencer console.

segment.source: Enables you to configure the virtual application package further.
segment.target: Enables you to configure the virtual application package further.

segment.source: You can perform the following configuration items:
segment.target: You can perform the following configuration items:

segment.source: Add, remove, or change the shortcuts, and configure the file type associations associated with the virtual application package that will be created on target computers.
segment.target: Add, remove, or change the shortcuts, and configure the file type associations associated with the virtual application package that will be created on target computers.

segment.source: Prepare virtual application package for streaming to improve the initial end user experience.
segment.target: Prepare virtual application package for streaming to improve the initial end user experience.

segment.source: Optimize the virtual application package for streaming across the network.
segment.target: Optimize the virtual application package for streaming across the network.

segment.source: Restrict operating systems that can run this package.
segment.target: Restrict operating systems that can run this package.

segment.source: Specify the operating systems that can run the virtual application package.
segment.target: Specify the operating systems that can run the virtual application package.
